name: Keynode
description:
A fast paced buttonmashing game using the numpad

currently includes 6 playable songs:

  1. the entry town theme from akians
  2. the keynode theme
  3. a remix of the adventure world series theme
  4. The akians power of time theme
  5. The adventure brawl theme
  6. The afterpart

This game is still in progress and will likely contain bugs
Please report them if you do find any!
